Upon using a dark acorn on it, which is purchased from the Hallowed Sepulchre for 3,000 hallowed marks, players unlock the right click "Metamorphosis" option to change between the giant and dark squirrel.

The giant squirrel is a skilling pet that can be obtained after completion of an agility course, as well as from ticket dispensers within the Brimhaven Agility Arena. Upon using a dark acorn on it, which is purchased from the Hallowed Sepulchre for 3,000 hallowed marks, players unlock the right click "Metamorphosis" option to change between the giant and dark squirrel.

When a player receives the pet, it will automatically try to appear as their follower. At the same time, a red message in the chatbox will state You have a funny feeling like you're being followed.

However, if a player receives a pet while having a follower out (for example, a cat), it will be placed into their inventory. When this occurs, the message in the chatbox will instead state You feel something weird sneaking into your backpack. If a player's inventory is full and they have a follower already, the pet will not appear.

On death, if a player loses their pet (as a follower or in their inventory) it will wander around for 30 seconds before disappearing completely.

Players can pay a one-time fee of 500,000 coins to Probita in East Ardougne to have this pet insured. If the pet is lost while insured, it can be reclaimed for 1,000,000 coins.

Contents

  • 1 Drop rates
    • 1.1 Agility courses

Drop rates[edit | edit source]

Shown below are the base chances of receiving the giant squirrel.[1] The pet chance is rolled after completing an agility course and when receiving an agility arena ticket within the Brimhaven Agility Arena. In the Hallowed Sepulchre, the chance is rolled upon teleporting back to the lobby via an obelisk.

A player's actual chances of receiving it is 1 in B - (Lvl * 25), where B is the base chance and Lvl is the player's Agility level. This does not affect the Hallowed Sepulchre, where the chance is static for each floor regardless of the player's Agility level.

The fastest method on average to receive the giant squirrel is the Penguin Agility Course at all levels.

Dialogue[edit | edit source]

This article has an associated transcript page.
Click here for the transcript.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The giant squirrel's appearance is based on the Indian giant squirrel in real life.
  • The second and third dialogues are a reference to the episode Squirrel Jokes from the Nickelodeon cartoon SpongeBob SquarePants.
  • The second dialogue might also be a reference to a Squirrel Song by Foamy the Squirrel.
  • After an update, giant squirrels may be fed acorns, resulting in the squirrel saying "Thank you! Ratatoskr be your guide and bring you many acorn trees!", this is in reference to the messenger squirrel of Norse mythology Ratatoskr. "Congratulations! You have paid your squirrel tax.... for now." will also appear in the chatbox.
  • The giant squirrel had a festive override wearing a yellow partyhat during the 2016 Christmas event, and a santa hat in the 2017, 2018, 2019, 2020, and 2021 Christmas events. Additionally, the dark squirrel had the override in 2020 and 2021. The chathead model had an override from 2017-2019, but did not override in 2016, 2020, or 2021.

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ↑ Jagex. Mod Kieren's Twitter account. 26 September 2016. (Archived from the original on 26 May 2020.) Mod Kieren: "Finally, the Agility pet rates! Try your best to get your hands on that Giant Squirrel! [1]"
  2. ↑ 2.0 2.1 Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 14 December 2021. (Archived from the original on 15 December 2021.) Mod Ash: "The base rates for the Shayzien course are 31804 and 29738, for the low & high tier routes respectively."
  3. ↑ Jagex. Mod Lenny's Twitter account. 28 October 2019. (Archived from the original on 7 July 2020.)
  4. ↑ Jagex. "OSRS Modcast (Q&A) - Darkmeyer and Hallowed Sepulchre, Player Survey, and more!." (00:24:57), youtube.com video. 2020-05-27.

The '''giant squirrel''' is a skilling [[pet]] that can be obtained after completion of an [[agility course]], as well as from ticket dispensers within the [[Brimhaven Agility Arena]]. Upon using a [[dark acorn]] on it, which is purchased from the [[Hallowed Sepulchre]] for 3,000 [[hallowed mark]]s, players unlock the right click "Metamorphosis" option to change between the giant and dark squirrel.

When a player receives the pet, it will automatically try to appear as their follower. At the same time, a red message in the [[Chat Interface|chatbox]] will state {{Colour|#ef1020|You have a funny feeling like you're being followed.}}

However, if a player receives a pet while having a follower out (for example, a [[cat]]), it will be placed into their [[inventory]]. When this occurs, the message in the chatbox will instead state {{Colour|#ef1020|You feel something weird sneaking into your backpack.}} If a player's inventory is full '''and''' they have a follower already, the pet will not appear.

On [[death]], if a player loses their pet (as a follower or in their [[inventory]]) it will wander around for 30 seconds before disappearing completely.

Players can pay a one-time fee of 500,000 [[coins]] to [[Probita]] in [[East Ardougne]] to have this pet insured. If the pet is lost while insured, it can be reclaimed for 1,000,000 coins.

==Drop rates==
Shown below are the base chances of receiving the giant squirrel.{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Kieren|url=https://twitter.com/JagexKieren/status/780482243584069632|date=26 September 2016|archiveurl=https://archive.is/wsug2|archivedate=26 May 2020|quote=Finally, the Agility pet rates! Try your best to get your hands on that Giant Squirrel! [https://pbs.twimg.com/media/CtSar3JXYAA34Yk.jpg]}} The pet chance is rolled after completing an [[agility course]] and when receiving an [[agility arena ticket]] within the [[Brimhaven Agility Arena]]. In the [[Hallowed Sepulchre]], the chance is rolled upon teleporting back to the lobby via an obelisk.

A player's actual chances of receiving it is '''1 in ''B'' - (''Lvl'' * 25)''', where ''B'' is the base chance and ''Lvl'' is the player's [[Agility]] level. This does not affect the Hallowed Sepulchre, where the chance is static for each floor regardless of the player's Agility level.

The fastest method on average to receive the giant squirrel is the [[Penguin Agility Course]] at all levels.

==Dialogue==
{{Hastranscript|Giant squirrel}}

==Trivia==
*The giant squirrel's appearance is based on the {{WP|Indian giant squirrel}} in real life.
*The second and third dialogues are a reference to the episode ''Squirrel Jokes'' from the {{Wp|Nickelodeon}} cartoon ''{{Wp|SpongeBob SquarePants}}''.
*The second dialogue might also be a reference to a Squirrel Song by Foamy the Squirrel.
*After {{UD|Revenant Cave Rewards and Troll Quest Announcement|an update}}, giant squirrels may be fed acorns, resulting in the squirrel saying ''"Thank you! Ratatoskr be your guide and bring you many acorn trees!"'', this is in reference to the messenger squirrel of Norse mythology {{wp|Ratatoskr}}. ''"Congratulations! You have paid your squirrel tax.... for now."'' will also appear in the chatbox.
*The giant squirrel had a festive override wearing a [[yellow partyhat]] during the [[2016 Christmas event/Gallery|2016 Christmas event]], and a [[santa hat]] in the [[2017 Christmas event/Gallery|2017]], [[2018 Christmas event/Gallery|2018]], [[2019 Christmas event/Gallery|2019]], [[2020 Christmas event/Gallery|2020]], and [[2021 Christmas event/Gallery|2021]] Christmas events. Additionally, the dark squirrel had the override in 2020 and 2021. The chathead model had an override from 2017-2019, but did not override in 2016, 2020, or 2021.
